Articles.Content:
Just checked my profile on a whim and noticed that I've been a member here for... Over 10 years now.  Time really flies when you're having fun blowing things up in the name of science.

To that end, I'd like to tip my hat and raise a virtual glass (Coffee and LOX, of course) to all my fellow rocket enthusiasts who have helped KSP survive and thrive over the years to get us to where we are today.  I hope all of you have a great weekend

Ive been here since August 7, 2013. <holds aloft a cryotank of LOX>
 

132605132023

On 5/13/2023 at 4:25 PM, Barklight said:

Just checked my profile on a whim and noticed that I've been a member here for... Over 10 years now.  Time really flies when you're having fun blowing things up in the name of science.

To that end, I'd like to tip my hat and raise a virtual glass (Coffee and LOX, of course) to all my fellow rocket enthusiasts who have helped KSP survive and thrive over the years to get us to where we are today.  I hope all of you have a great weekend

More fun in that reusable rockets became an thing during this time

I joined in high school, in order to achieve the title of 'first person to do something on the internet'. I ended up doing that a few times...I was a kid then. Now I am grappling with the fact I have become a rocket scientist.
